name.cns: 粉大的炸弹客召唤晶球
name.jp: ジャイアント・キャリアボム召喚のオーブ
name.tw: 粉大的炸彈客召喚晶球
name.vi: Quả cầu triệu hồi bom tàu sân bay khổng lồ

description.en: Allows you to summon a Giant Carrierbomb. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ar: Allows you to summon a Giant Carrierbomb. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.br: Irá invocar um Carrierbomb Gigante. Para usar, clique vezes no item e depois clique no chão para invocar o Gigante.
description.cns: 能召唤爆破者首领的魔法晶球
description.fi: Allows you to summon a Giant Carrierbomb. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fil: Allows you to summon a Giant Carrierbomb. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fr: Invoque un Géant Caboom pour une heure. Double-cliquez puis sélectionner une zone au sol pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Memungkinkan Anda memanggil Giant Carrierbomb. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali, dan pilih area di tanah terdekat untuk memanggil the Giant.
description.it: Allows you to summon a Giant Carrierbomb. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.jp: ジャイアント・キャリアボムを召喚する魔法のオーブ。使用してから召喚したい地面をクリックすると出現します。
description.kr: 거대 캐리아붐을 소환 하는 마법. 사용하려면 두 번 클릭한 다음 자이언트를 호출할 영역을 선택합니다.
description.nl: Allows you to summon a Giant Carrierbomb. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.pl: Allows you to summon a Giant Carrierbomb. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ru: Шар призыва гигантского бомбота. Дважды щелкните по шару, а затем укажите место на земле, где должен появиться монстр.
description.sp: Te permite invocar a un Carrierbomb Gigante. Para usarlo, haz doble click y selecciona el lugar donde quieras invocarlo.
description.sw: Allows you to summon a Giant Carrierbomb. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.th: ช่วยให้คุณสามารถเรียก Giant Carrierbomb ในการใช้งาน ให้ดับเบิ้ลคลิกและเลือกพื้นที่ที่อยู่ใกล้เคียงเพื่ออัญเชิญไจแอนท์
description.tw: 能召喚粉大的炸彈客的魔法晶球。要使用，請雙點擊它，然後選擇地面上的一個區域來召喚更大隻的。
description.vi: Cho phép bạn triệu hồi Bom tàu sân bay khổng lồ. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp vào nó và chọn một khu vực trên mặt đất gần đó để triệu hồi Người khổng lồ.
